There are fout main windows Launching applications core applications, autostart , and settings. 
launching applications these application can be launched as the defualt application with lxsession-default 

Core applications

This lets you set up things based on the session like changing the window manager allows you to set up multiple  monitors are the start and things under the hood with how LXDE works. 

Autostart
